issue.title: [CF 110] Download Failed
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.104, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7600.0

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 3.0.3

Description

Tried updating addons manually, and it just says "Download Failed"

Installed Addons

Atlasloot Enhanced - v6.02.00 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.72-5085 Dominos - 1.23.8 Gatherer - 3.2.3 Grid - 1.40000.1403 MikScrollingBattleText - v5.5.91 Omen Threat Meter - v3.1.0 QuestHelper - QuestHelper-4.0.3a.115r Mark 2 Recount - v4.0.1e release TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 3.0.3 VuhDo - VuhDo 2.72


> Posted by CurseForge user dahatch | Imported from CurseForge issue #110 | Raw

comments.body:
Is this still happening? Sounds like a problem with Curse more than anything; the site has been a few issues here and there lately.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
